tab1.title1: Welcome to Loona's Primal Fear Server
tab1.text1:
This Server is in an early stage.


If you have any suggestions, feel free to dm me on discord. 
UserName : missloona.

tab2.text1:
<TextStyle.Red>General Information</>

Infinite Thatch :

If you happen to find your thatch multiplying unreasonably, place an aa compost bin and disable thatch pulling.
That should resolve the issue.

<TextStyle.Red>Custom Drops :</>

<TextStyle.White>White Drops Contain Boss Trophies and Artifacts</>

<TextStyle.Green>Green Drops Contain Basic Armor</>

<TextStyle.LightBlue>Blue Drops Contain Saddles</>

<TextStyle.Blue>Purple Drops Contain Weapons</>

<TextStyle.Yellow>Yellow Drops Contain Tek Armor and Weapons</>

<TextStyle.Red>Red Drops Contain Tek Weapons, Armor and Saddles aswell as Element.</>

Ring Drops give the Same, just a bit better.

Cave Drops are essentially Ring Drops.

Artifact Containers in Caves give all Artifacts.

 Bosses Drop more Element ant guaranteed Tek Bp's.

tab3.text1:
1. A friendly and respectful interaction is mandatory at all times!

2. The instructions of administrators must always be followed.

3. Any advertising is prohibited.

4. Unreasonable tagging / pinging / marking of users & user ranks is prohibited.

5. No inappropriate profiles (usernames, avatars, accounts and statuses).

6. Sharing of personal data is prohibited.

7. Spamming is prohibited. No insults. No Flame use the ingame chat for that.

8. Stick to channel topics and keep conversations in the appropriate channels.

9. Any blackmail attempts will be punished with a ban, no matter what kind or how small!

10. Raiding Tribes that are massiveley weaker in comparison to yourself is forbidden.
That rule excludes random uninhabited structures around the map.
Ignoring will lead to a Structure and or Dino wipe dependant on Severity and may cause a ban.

11. Raiding methods which abuse bugs or cannot be defended against properly 
e.g. Dinos destroying turrets from out of their range or building impenetrable Platform Saddles
- is forbidden, ignoring this will lead to the tribe at fault getting wiped and banned.
